author: adammurdoch
msg: - Fixed problem when isReadable() or isWriteable() is the first method
- Methods now throw Exception, rather than FileSystemException.
- Specify the order that methods are called.
- Added FileTypeSelector to select on file type.

author: adammurdoch
msg: - Combined all messages into a single properties file.
- Changed Messages.getString() to use this combined file.

author: adammurdoch
msg: - Lazy creation of URL object in UrlFileObject.

author: adammurdoch
msg: Get rid of EOL from test file.  Was causing cross-platform weirdness.
